name: Enemies In Your Footsteps
description:
It's a battle to the death! 

Watch out! After you knock your first opponent off, his buddies come back WITH A VENGENCE! And this time, they will FOLLOW IN YOUR FOOTSTEPS!

Move your player with WASD. 

Press LEFT SHIFT for a quick DASH!

Punch by clicking the left mouse button.

Dev High Score: 22

----------------------
